detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in patterned jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, a smocked seam under the bust and smocking at the cuffs.
Leather sandals with jute-covered wedge heels, heel caps in woven fabric and a narrow, adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2.5 cm. Heel 9 cm.

Jacket in grained imitation leather with a collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Flap chest pockets, flap front pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined. The jacket is PETA Approved Vegan-certified and meets PETA’s requirements for vegan products. This certification guarantees that the product is entirely free from materials and substances of animal origin.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. V-neck and a wrapover, gently draped front with ties at one side. Long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Lined.
Short top in a soft rib knit in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps.
Printed sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.

Shaping thong briefs in microfibre with a firm sculpting effect on the waist. High waist, lined gusset and a string back. The briefs are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Decorative seams and concealed pockets at the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Lightly padded jacket in a quilted weave with a stand-up collar, hood and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and two mesh inner pockets. Elasticated edges around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Lace thong briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Long top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in a stretch premium cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Shaping seams at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist to create a fitted silhouette.
Top in textured jersey made from a cotton blend with a boat neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Shirt in organic Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, concealed zip at the neck and long sleeves with wide, turned-up cuffs with covered buttons.

Shirt in a striped premium cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Hat in fast-drying functional fabric made partly from recycled polyester.
Straight-cut, slightly longer jacket in lightweight twill made from a viscose blend. Narrow notch lapels, buttons at the front and flap front pockets. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood and detachable tie belt at the waist.

Suit in a patterned weave. Single-breasted jacket with notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets, an inner pocket and slit at the cuffs. Suit trousers with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets, a welt back pocket, and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy viscose weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck front and back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Sewn-in wrapover at the front, a concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and straight legs.
Short, fitted T-shirt in cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a small fabric appliqué on the front of the turned-up hem.
Romper suit in soft terry made from a cotton blend with short sleeves and short legs. Hood with sewn-on ears, and press-studs at the top and at the crotch.

Single-breasted jacket in soft, brushed fabric with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap welt front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, imitation suede elbow patches and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims. Slits at the hem.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Short, straight T-shirt dress in soft printed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Ankle boots with elastic gores in the sides, faux fur linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 9 cm.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.

Bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps that are doubled at the front with a decorative bow, and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Fitted top in airy, lace-patterned jersey with a round neck and long puff sleeves.
Leggings in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with notch lapels and a wrapover front with a concealed fastener. Shoulder pads, 3/4-length sleeves with slits at the cuffs, and a tie belt at the waist. Partly lined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Narrow metal rings decorated with sparkly stones.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, lacing at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Jacket in woven fabric with a taped zip down the front and a mesh-lined, drawstring hood with a small peak. Side pockets with a taped zip, one inner pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Felted wool beret. Unlined.
Super-wide culottes in a cupro weave with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Inset panels down the legs for added width.

Set with a blouse and pair of leggings in cotton. Blouse in a cotton weave with buttons down the front and long sleeves with concealed elastication at the cuffs. Jersey leggings with covered elastication at the waist.

Oversized hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, wrapover, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with long sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an asymmetric hem with overlocked edges.
Long-sleeved knitted jumper with a deep V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the back.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and wide tie belt. Sewn-in wrapover at the front with draping. Unlined.
Knee-length shorts in an airy denim weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets,a back pocket and decorative seams at the knees.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Narrow leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist and side stripes.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Waspie in lace and mesh with support panels at the front and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Knee-length dress in viscose jersey with short cap sleeves, a seam with a drawstring under the bust and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Unlined.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Jersey-lined cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and flap front, back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop front and back. Canvas linings and insoles. Heel 3 cm.
Long-sleeved top in cotton piqué with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal hoop earrings with pendants. Length 6.5 cm.
Straight-cut, calf-length coat in a soft, felted wool blend with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and a high-cut single back vent. No fasteners. Lined.
Lace suspender belt to hold nylon stockings up with elastication at the top and an adjustable fastening at the back.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in hard-washed cotton jersey with a text print on the front.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. High waist with wide smocking to create a fitted style at the top and wide style to the hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Foldaway backpack in woven fabric with a zip at the top and adjustable shoulder straps with plastic fasteners. One zipped inner compartment and a zipped outer compartment in which the backpack can be easily folded and enclosed. Practical carry strap at the top when the backpack is folded away. Size 14.5x30x46 cm. Size when folded 3x19x23 cm.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.
Windbreaker in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and zip down the front. Zipped front pockets with taped seams, ribbed cuffs and a fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
